game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of mysterious disappearances. The villagers are afraid to venture out after dark, and the village elder has asked for your help.
game.objective: Investigate the source of the disappearances and put an end to it.

tasks.description: Gather information about the disappearances from the villagers.
tasks.objective: Talk to at least 5 villagers and gather clues.

tasks.description: Investigate the old windmill on the outskirts of the village, where strange noises have been reported.
tasks.objective: Search for signs of what's causing the disappearances.

tasks.description: Confront the source of the disappearances and put an end to it.
tasks.objective: Defeat the Dark Cultists and rescue any captives.

game.title: The Disappearances of Oakwood
